title: Gravelord Azir feels buggy
body: Autottacks, moving, casting spells, everything seems to act slower and clunkier when compared to the normal skin. Riot please fix this.

replies.body:
Hey Santa Baroon,

There is an issue with base Azir's Sand Soldiers, iirc. This is going to be corrected next patch. This may be what's causing the skin to feel clunky. The skin itself is using base animations, so it shouldn't feel different. Once the next patch goes live, please feel free to let me know if the skin still feels different than the base!
